tag_list: videogames, iphone, development, programming, coding, console, handheld, android, mobile, nintendo
overview:
Vincenzo is a brilliant videogames programmer with a talent for problem solving.

He started coding when he was very very young and started working at the age of sixteen, while still studying at the high school. Together with other six passionate guys he created and released his first title: “The Fish Files”, an impressive adventure game for GameBoy Color. With the same group he founded 7th Sense Studios, where he worked while attending courses at University, and after his degree in Software Engineering. He was lead developer of more than ten 7th Sense’s projects, including games for GameBoy (The Addams Family, Paperboy+Rampage ), PC (Lucignolo), Nintendo DS (Last King Of Africa, Criminology), iPhone (Fallen Ep-1), iPad (BricksGoGo HD). Vincenzo moved to London in 2010 to lead the development team at UTV Ignition for an action game for consoles. He was mentioned into the Develop Online 30Under30 list of Games Development rising stars of 2010.

milestones.description:
Vincenzo was featured on the Develop Magazine's annual talent spotlight "30 Under 30".

The award brings attention to the youthful stars of today's game development sector who look to be destined for great things in the industry of tomorrow.
Joined Gamesys (Iwi) as Lead Mobile Developer
